item.title: Marvel Stars Stand for Jimmy Kimmel: Pedro Pascal Defends Free Speech While Others Endorse Boycott
item.description: Hollywood stars — including those with Disney, ABC, Hulu and Marvel Cinematic Universe credits — are continuing to show their support for the ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ host in the wake of his suspension.

item.title: Kerry Washington, Greg Berlanti and Joseph Gordon-Levitt Set for A Day of Unreasonable Conversation
item.description: The summit, put on by Propper Daley BPI to start a dialogue between creators and policymakers, returns to the Getty Center on Oct. 6.

item.title: Daniel Craig Returns to Solve “Impossible Crime” in ‘Wake Up Dead Man’ Trailer
item.description: Rian Johnson’s third ‘Knives Out’ film hits Netflix later this year and also stars Josh O’Connor, Glenn Close and Josh Brolin.
